Binary: plymouth, plymouth-x11, libplymouth5, libplymouth-dev, plymouth-label, plymouth-themes
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), docbook-xsl, libdrm-dev, libcairo2-dev, libevdev-dev, libfreetype-dev, libgtk-3-dev (>= 3.14.0), libpango1.0-dev, libpng-dev, libudev-dev [linux-any], meson, pkg-config, systemd, xsltproc
Package-List: libplymouth-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libplymouth5 deb libs optional arch=any plymouth deb misc optional arch=linux-any plymouth-label deb misc optional arch=linux-any plymouth-themes deb misc optional arch=linux-any plymouth-x11 deb misc optional arch=linux-any
